籤詩版本二:
Luan Feng Xiang adamizidwa m'madzi, koma panthawiyo adazunzidwa ndi Queer.
Ndinadabwa kumva kuti tsiku lina mitambo inali kutali, koma ndinabwezabe zovala zanga kwa inu.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chizindikiro cha Luan ndi Phoenix kukhala ndi mvula.
Chilichonse chimabwera nthawi ikafika.
解曰: Woipayo akutukuka tsiku ndi tsiku. Njonda sayenera kuchita kalikonse. Ingodzisungirani nokha. Chitanipo kanthu nthawi ikakwana.
籤詩故事一:
◇Gao Jun amatsimikizira ukwati
Kumayambiriro kwa Ufumu wa Song, Zhao Kuangyin anagwirizanitsa kumpoto ndipo dziko lonse linagonja. Zinthu zinali zovuta kwambiri. Mphwake wa Zhao Kuangyin, Gao Junbao, mnyamata yemwe anali ndi mfuti ya golide, anachoka ku Bianjing kuti athyole msasa wa Shouzhou.
, akudutsa pa Phiri la Shuangsuo, anaphwanya chizindikiro cha Mwamuna chomwe chinakhazikitsidwa ndi Liu Jinding, ndipo aŵiriwo anapikisana.” Chotsatirapo chake, Liu Jinding anagonjetsa Gao Junbao katatu ndi luso lake la karati lapamwamba kwambiri, ndipo anasinthanitsa mabelu a golidi ndi mabelu asiliva kwa moyo wawo wonse. Mphwake wa Zhao Kuangyin, Gao Junbao, kuti apulumutse Zhao Kuangyin yemwe anali atatsekeredwa ku Shouzhou, adachoka ku Bianjing ndikudutsa paphiri la Shuangsuo. masewera apamwamba a karati ndipo anakakamizika kutero. Awiriwa adatsogolera gulu la anthu kuti lizizinga ndikupulumutsa Zhao Kuangyin.
(Fanizo la nkhaniyi ndiloti awiriwa sadayanjanitsidwe (anachitiridwa nkhanza), koma pambuyo pake adayanjanitsidwa.
聖意: Banja sali bwino kwa iwe mwini, samala kufunafuna ndalama, kutsekereza bizinesi, kudikirira ukwati, kuchedwa, Liujia, wapaulendo wabodza, kukhala m'minda, mphutsi za silika, kuchedwa, kuwonongeka kwa ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, zovuta kupeza anthu, milandu, kutayika, kusamuka, kusamala, kutaya katundu, matenda aakulu, kukulitsa phiri, kusintha kwakukulu
第X籤: Makumi asanu ndi anayi mphambu atatu apambana lotale
